name: What Would Our Child Look Like 2 ? - Baby Face Maker By Parent Photo
name_original: What Would Our Child Look Like 2 ? - Baby Face Maker By Parent Photo
description:
This app allow you to take photos of two people and see what their baby would look like. The "newborn" babies use actual parts of their parent faces.

Now you can create babies with your friends photos and match them up with each other.

How to Use：
- Select two photos, you can select from your photo library or taken by your camera
- Zoom in or out the selected photos,
- Click button "start prediction"
- Save the results to photo libray
- Share the result with your friends

New Features(Version 2):
- Add some useful tools
- And some mini games
